question_stem:
Question 3
Consider the leaf node at the bottom right of the image (yes: 8/8). Select all the correct options.
A
There are 8 customers with poutcome = success & education = primary or unknown.
B
Out of the 58 customers with poutcome = success, 8 of them subscribed to the bank service
C
Customers with poutcome = success & education = primary or unknown are predicted to have a 100% probability of subscribing to the bank service
D
This leaf node provides no information on whether customers will subscribe to the bank service
